perturbation.original_text:
THIS SECOND AMENDMENT TO CO-BRANDING AGREEMENT (this "Amendment") is
made and entered into, effective for all purposes and in all respects as of
the 23rd day of February, 1998, by and between PC QUOTE, INC., with its
principal place of business at 300 South Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois
60605 ("PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc., with its principal place of business at
33 West 17th Street, New York, New York 10011 ("ABW").
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, PCQ and ABW have executed that certain Co-Branding
Agreement dated October 11, 1996, as amended on December 10, 1996 (as so
amended, the "Agreement")Í¾
THIS SECOND AMENDMENT TO CO-BRANDING AGREEMENT (this "Amendment") is
made and entered into, effective for all purposes and in all respects as of
the 23rd day of February, 1998, by and between PC QUOTE, INC., with its
principal place of business at 300 South Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois
60605 ("PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc., with its principal place of business at
33 West 17th Street, New York, New York 10011 ("ABW").
perturbation.explanation: The standard introduction has been duplicated and moved into the 'WHEREAS' section. The original introduction of the document becomes mixed with the recitals, which are normally distinct sections of the contract. The duplication introduces redundancy, potentially confusing a reader about the agreement's effective date and parties.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles regarding clarity and unambiguous language.

perturbation.original_text:
To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement
conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, such provision
of this Second Amendment shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all
respects.
perturbation.changed_text:
To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement
conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, such provision
of this Second Amendment shall be interpreted in good faith, but without any guarantee of prevailing or governing any specific purpose.
perturbation.explanation: This change weakens the enforceability of the Second Amendment. By removing the direct statement that the Second Amendment prevails in case of conflict, and replacing it with an obligation for 'good faith' interpretation that lacks any specific guarantee, it introduces uncertainty and reduces the legal weight of the amendment. The original text has a clause that has changed and has made the text more ambiguous.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles regarding the definiteness and enforceability of contract terms.

perturbation.original_text:
Except as modified hereby, the Agreement and its terms and
provisions are hereby ratified and confirmed for all purposes and in all
respects.
perturbation.changed_text:
Except as modified hereby, the Agreement and its terms and
provisions are hereby ratified and confirmed for all purposes and in most respects.
perturbation.explanation: By using the phrase 'most respects' instead of 'all respects,' we're creating ambiguity about which specific terms or provisions are not being ratified, which introduces uncertainty about the agreement's continuing validity. This change weakens the confirmation, leaving doubts about which parts are still active and which aren't.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles regarding the clarity and enforceability of contract terms.
